title: Strava 2021 review sums up another Year in Sport booming 63% amongst global turmoil
content:
Strava’s latest 2021 Year in Sport review dives into the numbers behind another booming year for tracking & sharing our physical activity in the midst of ongoing shifts in global lifestyles. Whether it’s the unrelenting COVID-19 pandemic that still has many of us riding solo more often or in smaller groups, or extreme weather that’s

The post Strava 2021 review sums up another Year in Sport booming 63% amongst global turmoil appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
